Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to us and the benefits it offers, we are offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $1,200,000. We are confident that this offer not only represents great value but also aligns with your expectations for such a high-quality product. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this exclusive offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
